name: Retake Control
description:
Made in collaboration with https://laurablicher.itch.io/ Laura Blicher

A simple third person shooter with a story about retaking control of a science facility that has a bad case of zombies. 

WASD controls, shift to sprint, right click to aim down sights, left click to shoot

Has an alternative ending that can be found by taking back control of your actions and not following instructions.

Credits: 

Laura Blicher - Art, shaders

Jonas Halver - Design, programming, voice, sounds

The ending was left on the cutting room floor due to time. In one ending, you destroy the machine and the facility explodes, killing you and everyone nearby. In the other, you reverse the corruption. Hope that makes sense ;)
